acts.title: Act 1 — First Date
steps: You decide to meet someone new for coffee.
Your child is staying with your ex.
Do you tell your ex about this date or keep it private?

acts.title: Act 2 — Introducing the Idea
steps: Weeks later, your child overhears you on the phone.
Choices: be honest but gentle, change subject, or dismiss.

acts.title: Act 3 — First Reactions
steps: Your ex finds out that you’ve started dating.
They confront you — calmly, defensively, or angrily.
Choose to reassure, argue, or refuse to discuss.

acts.title: Act 4 — Resolution
steps: Positive: ex accepts boundaries; child feels secure.
Negative: conflict worsens; child feels caught in the middle.
